string.text: The fight is canceled. The applicant was frightened and came out to the ring.
It took 10 seconds!
It took 20 seconds!
It took 30 seconds!
It took 40 seconds!
It took 50 seconds!
A minute passed!
Took a minute and 10 seconds!
Took a minute and 20 seconds!
It took fifteen minutes!
The battle began!

Attention! Attention! Soon the Arena will start a new battle! In the left corner of the arena, the bloodthirsty and ever-hungry Bloodsucker! In the right corner of the arena, man? Yeah, man! They call him the Bullseye!

Attention! Attention! Soon the Arena will start a new battle! In the left corner of the arena, he knows kung fu, he is able to bend spoons, it's a Burer! In the right corner of the arena, the hero whose quest will never end! They call him the Bullseye!
So! The enemy put down a contender. Here is the number!
So! The applicant has put the enemy, but did not in the time allotted and lost!

Attention! Attention! Soon the Arena will start a new battle! In the left corner of the arena, white, fluffy, but incredibly angry Pseudodog! In the right corner of the arena, coming from nowhere, going nowhere. They call him the Bullseye!

Attention! Attention! Soon the Arena will start a new battle! In the left corner of the arena, you know him, you love him. And he hates you. It's A Beast! In the right corner of the arena, still alive, Bullseye!

Attention! Attention! Soon the Arena will start a new battle! In the left corner of the arena, martial arts expert and nutrition Snork! In the right corner of the arena, the man without a past. They call him the Bullseye!
Time's up! The Challenger lost, but still fighting for his life!
So! The applicant managed to put the enemy in the allotted time and win!
As you please.
Stalker, man! I beg don't leave, help us! The anarchists shot down our helicopter and we're going to finish. We have wounded, we need your help!
Hehe, that's all. Nope your helicopter! Now and you will get rat government!
Well, all Wolfhound, you had it. Flying in a military helicopter. Now they have, like puppies!
The Professor has escaped! Urgent all in pursuit of Kruglov! He had not gone far.
Labeled, help me!!! Killing me!!!
Cost, Jackal. First finish school, and then going to put ultimatums.
If you attack, I'll destroy information. Figs you, and not my work.
If you don't want me to destroy the evidence stay away.
Wolfhound, get your dogs while tails not skinned!
All the talk is over. The shooting starts.
Man, let's put here! The thing is. Together we will finish these government rats.
Labeled. You bitch, for the bases we will pay.
They're coming for us!? Labeled, stop them.
In short, you wise fool. Or give me the results, or leave in a plastic bag.
Kruglov, I don't know Latin, but I know the language of weapons. I ask you on it? Or will you give information?
Professor, you're a smart man. Give information and go on all four sides.

Kruglov, do you still not understand?! We knocked your a fucking helicopter and we need that information that you carry. After you give it to us, you can with your children to blame. This is your last chance to get out of here, come on the flash drive and go
Urgently go here! Near the Radar, my guys caught a crazy Stalker, are now trying to interrogate him.
Bullseye, are you crazy? Immediately stop shooting! That's an order!
Labeled, immediately stop shooting! If you disobey a command you're dead!
Labeled. For violating the code of Debt you are banished from the group. From now on you are our enemy.
Bullseye, you disobeyed a direct order! Now you're dead. Debt isn't as forgiving!
Stop shooting! On-site Debt shooting is prohibited! Disobeying will be punished!
Attention! For violation of the law on the use of weapons on the territory of Debt, Labeled declared criminal.
Attention! Discovered the killer! Order to all in the territory of duty! Immediately destroy the killer!
Stalker, help! We were attacked by mercenaries, half of us were killed. Help us, we are not in debt stay.
Help us to fight through an ambush near the plant, I'm thrown off the coordinates. Be careful, by the Wolfhound with the thugs near the helicopter.
